transcript:
Customer: Haan haan, ek madam mera ek call chalu hai ek line pe.
Executive: Sir, do minute, hello.
Customer: Madam mera ek call chalu hai.
Executive: Haan, hello. Haan haan boliye.
Customer: [inaudible] nahi honge sir. 
Executive: Thik hai chalega sir chalega koi problem nahi.
Customer: Material ka aapko 500 600 meter hai, teen char din toh lagega mujhe banane mein.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Thik hai, okay, haan haan.
Customer: Haan boliye madam.
Executive: Haan ji, sir actually kya tha, main Shreya baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART trade office se, abhi baat hui aapki Tanya se. Haan. Aapne na ek concern raise kiya tha usko main close karte ja rahi hu but sir aapse puchna ye tha ki matlab aap baar baar like aapse matlab by mistake ho gaya tha na customer care pe call.
Haan haan.
Executive: Thik hai matlab baar baar customer care pe.
Customer: Main samjha nahi aap kya bol rahe hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo kaha pe click karna hota hai wo bataiye na wo madam ko bhi maine puch liya abhi wo video call mit ka kaha pe click karne ke baad wo aapko concern jata hai wo kaha pe system hai wo batayenge toh main wo galti nahi karunga na. 9696 pe aap call karte ho kya?
Customer: Nahi main kyu karunga call six unke upar mein.
Executive: Nahi actually aap na call 9696 pe call kar dete ho isliye na aapka ye ticket.
Customer: Nahi nahi maine kabhi nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Achcha. Mera itna kam mere mere jitna business schedule hai usme kyu main phone karunga.
Executive: Achcha thik hai, main na Tanya ka number aapko whatsapp pe karwa deti hu aap unka number save kar lijiye kabhi bhi koi problem hota hai aap us pe hi call kijiye sir. Thik hai aapke account manager hai wo. Haan. Aur customer aapne 9696 pe call kiya tha shayad sir isliye ye ticket raise ho gaya hai.
Executive: Thik hai main dekh leti hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo kya hota hai customer jab kabhi bhi number wo chodta nahi hai, sabhi jo number pe aata hai toh us pe call karne ke baad mein udhar call jata hoga kyuki virtual number hai na. Toh virtual number pe call karne ke baad mein wo 96 mein convert ho jata hai wo.
Executive: Achcha wo 9696 pe kaise convert ho jata hai ek second last time aap nahi nahi main online matlab online pe main yaha pe click karte hai na jaise aapne jo tally ka jo lagaya hua hai niche button.
Customer: Haan main main kya jaan bujh ke wo tally wale ko nahi phone karta na unka aata hai phone har time mein. Haan kya har time mein aise samjho main yaha pe abhi main IndiaMART ka website open kar raha hu abhi dekhiye aap.
Customer: Ek second.
Customer: Abhi ye tally tally on web tally on web ye toh mujhe kuch kya hai ye mujhe malum nahi hai samjho in case mein mujhme main setting karne ke liye jata hu jo matlab by chance matlab setting ka button har har time aadmi wahi pe click nahi karta hai na toh bar samjho galti se tally on web pe click karta hai samjho by mistake ho jata hai toh wo tally wale ka phone aata hai nahi aapne ye ye request dala tha ye wo wala tha hum toh jaan bujh ke usko jaan bujh ke hum nahi kar rahe hai na tally wale ko.
Executive: Aap setting pe jaake customer care ko for example settings pe aap click PNS pe mat click kiya karo sir thik hai. PNS aap PNS yaha pe 96 pe customer care pe customer care pe bilkul bhi matlab kahi bhi customer care likha ho na aap us pe click mat karna baki ek bar main ek bar team se puch leti hu fir main aapko ek bar inform kar deti hu ki kaha pe click nahi karna. Thik hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Main ye concern close kar rahi hu aapki mail id pe ek bar satisfied ka aayega ek bar aap yes kar dena sir use please.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Thik hai okay. Haan haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is mistakenly calling customer care.

- Wants to know where to click to avoid it.



Resolution:

- Executive explained not to click on PNS.

- Executive will inform where not to click.

- Provided Tanya's number on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to confirm satisfaction on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- customer care, settings, call, pns, tally
